oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Home recording on a 4 year-old Roy Acuff Jr.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Home recording of a 4 year-old Roy Neill Acuff Jr., who performs a cappella songs and talks with his father, Roy Acuff, and mother, Mildred (unconfirmed).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Acuff family home recording -- Acuff family home recording
